event.title: ADempiere Japan Users Group / the 14th workshop
event.catch: 日本ADempiere ユーザー会 / 第14回勉強会
event.description:
Time Table

  1. Opening (はじめに)

    • Introduction of ADempeire (ADempiereの紹介)
    • Recent Movements (最近の動き)
  2. Business Part (業務編)

    • Basics of Japanese financial accounting / Settlement #4 (財務会計の基本/決算)
  3. System Part (システム編)

    • Basic concept of ADempiere (ADempiereの基本コンセプト)
    • ADempiere3.4 ERP Solutions

      • Chap.5 Procurement Activities (仕入業務)
      • Chap.6 Landed Costs, Production, and Sales Activities (輸入仕入コスト、製造、販売業務)
  4. ADempiere-related Topic (ADempiere関連トピック)

    • 中小企業におけるシステム導入 (仮題)
  5. Wrap Up (まとめ)

    • Q/A
    • Free Talk (フリーディスカッション)

(USTREAM)

  • ADJUG – workshop
    http://www.ustream.tv/channel/adjug—-12th-workshop
    2:00 PM – 5:00 PM JST on the 7th, July

Materials (unfinished)

http://sourceforge.jp/projects/adempiere/docs/?category_id=1112
event.place: Waseda University (早稲田大学　１１号館 819教室)
